title: My Staff Need - Bridging Talent, Elevating Care
html: Home
description: Bridging Talent, Elevating Care Our team at My Staff Need is committed to helping you navigate your career path with ease. Contact us to discover the opportunities and resources available to you. About Us At My Staff Need, we’re dedicated to linking people with meaningful work while addressing crucial staffing shortages, ensuring that patients always receive the care they need. Since our founding in 2020, our core value of putting others first and our people-centered approach have shaped our company culture. With decades of experience supporting large managed programs, our team is our greatest strength. We’ve continuously refined our recruitment and delivery model to drive success. My Staff Need has years of experience in the employment services industry, with expertise across all areas of staffing, including MSP/VMS programs. We’ve had the opportunity to work on some of the largest and most complex programs nationwide. Learn More https://lifelinkhealthtech.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/about-us-home.mp4 Core Values Care Responsibility Integrity Innovation Excellence Diversity Collaboration Commitment Our Milestones Healthcare Professional Partner With Us 0 + Healthcare Facility Partners 0 + Refferal Bonus Paid Out 0 + Client Satisfaction Rate 0 % All Round Digital Solution HEALTHCARE STAFFING SOLUTIONS My Staff Need’s Healthcare Staffing Solutions deliver top-tier clinical and non-clinical talent for Temporary and Direct Hire positions through customized, compliant, and scalable workforce strategies. RPO My Staff Need’s RPO provides end-to-end recruitment solutions, streamlining talent acquisition with scalable, cost-efficient, and compliant hiring strategies. MANAGED SERVICE PROGRAM My Staff Need’s Managed Service Program (MSP) streamlines healthcare staffing by providing end-to-end workforce management, vendor coordination, and compliance oversight for optimized staffing solutions. LOCUM TENENS My Staff Need is a leading national Locum Tenens agency for physicians, nurse practitioners, physician assistants, dentists, and CRNAs. Finding your ideal locum tenens opportunity starts right here. AI-DRIVEN STAFFING My Staff Need’s AI-Driven Healthcare Staffing leverages advanced technology to match top talent with healthcare facilities, ensuring efficiency, quality, and compliance. 24/7 SUPPORT My Staff Need provides 24/7 support for clinicians and clients, ensuring seamless communication, issue resolution, and uninterrupted healthcare staffing services. Why My Staff Need? At My Staff Need, we’re dedicated to linking people with meaningful work while addressing crucial staffing shortages, ensuring that patients always receive the care they need. Since our founding in 2020, our core value of putting others first and our people-centered approach have shaped our company culture. With decades of experience supporting large managed programs, our team is our greatest strength. We’ve continuously refined our recruitment and delivery model to drive success. My Staff Need has years of experience in the employment services industry, with expertise across all areas of staffing, including MSP/VMS programs. We’ve had the opportunity to work on some of the largest and most complex programs nationwide. From finding the perfect assignment to handling all logistics, they ensured I had everything I needed. Their 24/7 support is truly a game-changer!” David Reynolds, Medical Assistant Dallas, TX | Baylor Scott & White Medical Center I’ve never worked with a staffing agency that cared so much about my career growth. My Staff Need placed me in an amazing facility, and their team was there every step of the way! Dr. Michael Hayes, Internal Medicine New York, NY | Mount Sinai Hospital My Staff Need provided me with a rewarding locum tenens opportunity at a top-tier hospital. Their team handled licensing, scheduling, and negotiations effortlessly, allowing me to focus on patient care. Samantha Green, DPT Phoenix, AZ | Banner University Medical Center Working with My Staff Need was the best decision for my career. They matched me with a fantastic rehab facility where I get to make a real impact every day!
